textAfterTable: 11 Songs Biography Born: 29 April 1947 in Dayton, OH Genre: Rock Years Active: '50s, '60s, '70s, '80s, '90s, '00s, '10s Tommy James & the Shondells — the very mention of their name, even to someone who doesn't really know their music, evokes images of dances and the kind of fun that rock & roll represented before it redefined itself on more serious terms. And between 1966 and 1969, the group enjoyed 14 Top 40 hits, most of which remain among the most eminently listenable (if not always respected) examples of pop/rock. The group was almost as much of a Top 40 radio institution of the time as Creedence... Full bio Top Albums and Songs by Tommy James 1. I Love Christmas
